name: Guinecean

grantsPowers.name: Caravan Master
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increased Chance For More and Higher Quality Materials From Caravans

grantsPowers.name: Double Jump
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Jump Again While Near the Apex of Your First Jump

grantsPowers.name: Epicurean
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Gain Bonus Food Pool When You Eat

grantsPowers.name: Guinecean_Burrow_Tooltip_Passive_name
grantsPowers.description: Toggle: Stealths Player, only for Non-Stealth Classes

grantsPowers.name: Saltpeter Rounds
grantsPowers.description: Pistol Shots Snare Targets, Increases Pistol Range, only for Duelist

grantsPowers.name: Leap Roll
grantsPowers.description: Leap Roll in a WASD direction

lore: By legend, the Guineceans were transformed from their animal forefathers into sentient creatures by Gaea, the Earth Mother, at her moment death.
